articles.author: Lolita C. Baldor, Matthew Lee
articles.title: Why the US evacuation from Sudan left Americans behind - The Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Warring factions trying to seize control of the east African nation of Sudan have plunged the country into chaos,  and thousands are fleeing the capital of Khartoum and nearby battle zones.
